Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with DCIS invasive, her2/neu+++, ER+. I have had lumpectomy x2 with no clear margins I'm up to 7cm. Go for double radical modified mastectomy with lymph node check on both sides on the 23rd then Herceptin treatment and maybe chemo. BOY AM I OVERWHELMED, HER2/neu+++ from what I've seen isn't good
Posts.Title: New to this
